mapper.select: SELECT tu.userId, tu.createDate, tu.num, tk.id, tk.ticketName, tk.content, tk.money, tk.ticketNo, tk.type, tk.useRange, tk.numLimit, tk.status FROM t_ticket tk LEFT JOIN t_ticket_user tu ON tk.id=tu.ticketId WHERE tu.userId=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM t_ticket_user WHERE userId=#{userId} AND ticketId=#{ticketId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ticket_user (ticketId, userId, createDate) VALUES (#{ticketId}, #{userId}, now())
